greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-2x)/(1-8x^2).
comment: Second inverse binomial transform of A094013. Third inverse binomial transform of A000129(2n-1). The unsigned sequence has g.f. (1+2x)/(1-8x^2) and a(n) = 2^(3n/2)*(1/2 + sqrt(2)/4 + (1/2 - sqrt(2)/4)*(-1)^n).
Abs(a(n)) = A113836(n+1) - A113836(n) for n > 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 22 2010
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,8).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 21 2004
